iiv.display

Class DisplayDraw

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • iiv.display.DisplayComponent
            • iiv.display.DisplayDraw
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocationMapping, ShowPointImage, Croppable, FilterSampling, Flippable, Rotatable, Zoomable, CNUFileObject, ShowStatus, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DisplayShape, DisplayText, ShowPointDisplayLine

    public abstract class DisplayDraw
extends DisplayComponent
    DisplayDraw is an abstract class that defines standard routines for graphics drawing display components. displayed by iiV.
    Since:
    iiV1.0
    See Also:
    CNUDisplay, Serialized Form
